name: fit4privacy
profile:
Privacy laws like GDPR, CCPA, PDPB, etc are becoming more and more important. So, we help you in making compliance with privacy laws simple and manageable. On this channel, we share information for Data Privacy Experts, Business Owners, and Privacy Enthusiasts. The objective is to provide you with content that is informational, simple, and thought-provoking. 

If you wish to contact us, please reach out at hello@fit4privacy.com. Visit us at www.fit4privacy.com

#privacy #dataprotection #ai #fit4privacy #fit4privacypodcast #gdpr #dataprivacy #data
